mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.item_remark AS itemRemark,p.price,p.item_name AS itemName,p.logo_path as productLogoPath, ((SELECT SUM(stock_qty) FROM app_product_inventory WHERE product_id=p.id) - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_product_order WHERE product_id=p.id)) AS counts, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(logo_path) FROM app_product_photo WHERE product_id=p.id) AS photos, u.real_name AS realName,u.nick_name AS nickName,u.logo_path AS logoPath,FLOOR(o.comment_star) AS commentStar, o.comment_remark AS commentRemark,SUBSTRING(CAST(o.comment_time AS CHAR),1,16) AS commentTime, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_product_collect WHERE product_id=p.id AND uid=#{uid}) AS isCollect, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.color) AS color,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.size) AS size, (SELECT `value` FROM sys_setting WHERE id='ded_product') AS ratio FROM app_product p LEFT JOIN app_product_order o ON o.id=(SELECT id FROM app_product_order WHERE product_id=p.id ORDER BY comment_time DESC LIMIT 1) LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=o.uid LEFT JOIN app_product_inventory i ON i.product_id=p.id WHERE p.id=#{id}
